name: Charly Diams
storyline:
Your mission is to locate the hiding place of the thousand blue diamonds. To do this, you must previously discover and collect the seven miraculous flowers that are scattered around the world.

From the Bay of Bengal to the Sahara desert, from the heart of France to the Andes mountain range, from Lake Titicaca to the most disparate places, the road is long. Long and dangerous because you must escape all the traps that men and the elements will set for you to prevent you from getting hold of the fabulous treasure.
summary: Charly Diams is an action adventure game about a young man Charly searching for a hiding place of a treasure with blue diamonds. Help Charly collect seven miraculous flowers scattered around the world in order to unveil this place.
